name: Theseus And The Cyclops
description:
It's highly recommended playing this via the windows build, WebGL has caused some odd side-effects.

A 3-week Project designed by Chris and Zoe. 

Stuck in a maze with a cyclops! It's do or die, find a way to kill the monster before he kills you!

Controls:

Movement - WASD or Arrow Keys.

Sprint - Left Shift

Interact with chest/lever - E

Use Item in Hand - F

Select Item - Numbers 1 - 9

Hints:

The rope and stones require you to look at the ground to activate.

The bait requires you to be looking at the trap (you're looking in the right place if hint text appears).
